item.description:
6:00 p.m. - 9:00 p.m. in Rockville Bank Park (near L.L.Bean)

Evergreen Walk is starting off their Summer outdoor concert series with the Savage Brothers. I've seen this band play several times(classic rock cover band), and they are one of the better local bands around, and always entertain.

Come join us for a picnic dinner (potluck, please bring something to share with others) and then stay for the concert afterwards.

Concerts end at 9PM, and there is always an option to have drinks over at Adams Mill for those not ready to call it a night yet.


**Don't forget to bring a lawn chair, and bug spray!!**
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the chick with the long red hair, black folding chair, and tan blanket-someplace near the lawn area.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Picnic and Free Outdoor Concert
